frontend application with a Django REST Framework backend. Currently, the frontend uses mock/fake data, and I need to integrate it with the real backend API.
Project Structure:

Backend: Django REST Framework running at http://localhost:8000 (or as configured in docker-compose)
Frontend: Next.js with TypeScript, TanStack React Query, and shadcn/ui components
The backend has the following apps: accounts, clients, invoicing, products

Backend API Endpoints Available:

Authentication: /api/accounts/ (login, register, user management)
Clients: /api/clients/ (CRUD operations)
Products: /api/products/ (CRUD operations)
Invoices: /api/invoicing/invoices/ (CRUD operations)
Quotes: /api/invoicing/quotes/ (CRUD operations)

Current Frontend Setup:

API configuration file: src/lib/api.ts
TanStack React Query setup: src/lib/query-client.ts
Custom hooks in: src/hooks/ (use-products.ts, use-suppliers.ts, etc.)
Type definitions: src/lib/types.ts

What I Need:

Update the API client (src/lib/api.ts) to:

Connect to the Django backend (handle CSRF tokens, authentication tokens)
Add proper error handling and response interceptors
Handle authentication (JWT or session-based as used by django-allauth)


Update all custom hooks in src/hooks/ to:

Replace mock data with real API calls using TanStack React Query
Use proper TypeScript types from the backend
Handle loading states, errors, and mutations correctly


Update authentication:

Implement login/register flows in src/app/(auth)/
Handle token storage and authentication state
Add protected route logic


Update forms and components:

Make sure all forms (invoice-form, quote-form, etc.) POST to real endpoints
Handle API responses and show proper success/error messages
Update table components to display real data


Add proper TypeScript interfaces that match the Django models:

User, Profile, Client, Product, Invoice, Quote models
Make sure serializer fields match the frontend types



Important Requirements:

Use TanStack React Query (v5+) for all data fetching and mutations
Maintain proper TypeScript typing throughout
Keep the existing UI/UX and component structure
Add loading skeletons where appropriate
Handle errors gracefully with user-friendly messages
Support pagination if the backend returns paginated results
Ensure CSRF token handling for Django
Use environment variables for API URL configuration

Authentication Details:
The backend uses django-allauth with dj-rest-auth. Please implement:

Token-based authentication (store tokens securely)
Automatic token refresh if needed
Redirect to login page when unauthorized
Include auth tokens in all protected API requests

Please provide step-by-step implementation with code examples for each file that needs to be modified.
